about_the_game:
Theme Concept
"Do you remember what innocent acts you did as a child?"
We present childhood memories that resonate with the 2000s generation with games and illustrations, and by exploring the game, the audience are reminded of their own unique childhood memories. We also want to convey the notion that even if you are still on the journey of growing up, don't forget the spirit of dreaming boldly when you were a child.

Leader plot
One day when the player was tidying up the room, he was accidentally hit by the "friend address book". After opening it curiously, it suddenly emitted a strong light and sucked the player in!
When he woke up again, he found that he had traveled through time and space and returned to the elementary school classroom, and a stranger appeared behind him...! ?

Gameplay and features
After entering the game, the player needs to interact with the students or solve problems in order to obtain "Memory Fragments" and "Memory Power" to return to the original world.
There are also many "hidden easter eggs, achievements" or BL books (!?) in the game waiting for you to explore, let's take a childhood journey together!

Theme Concept
"Do you remember what innocent acts you did as a child?"
We present childhood memories that resonate with the 2000s generation with games and illustrations, and by exploring the game, the audience are reminded of their own unique childhood memories. We also want to convey the notion that even if you are still on the journey of growing up, don't forget the spirit of dreaming boldly when you were a child.

Leader plot
One day when the player was tidying up the room, he was accidentally hit by the "friend address book". After opening it curiously, it suddenly emitted a strong light and sucked the player in!
When he woke up again, he found that he had traveled through time and space and returned to the elementary school classroom, and a stranger appeared behind him...! ?

Gameplay and features
After entering the game, the player needs to interact with the students or solve problems in order to obtain "Memory Fragments" and "Memory Power" to return to the original world.
There are also many "hidden easter eggs, achievements" or BL books (!?) in the game waiting for you to explore, let's take a childhood journey together!
legal_notice:
Statement

This game is made with RPG Maker MZ and is for free to play and academic use only.
Except for paid purchases, plug-ins and music used in the game have indicated the author and their source in the game.
Please do not reprint, sell, change or steal all materials and content in any game without permission.
The plot is purely fictitious and any similarity is purely coincidental.

Downloading the game means that you have read and understood this statement, and violations will be investigated ♥.

Sincerely,
Gathering Our Childhoods Production Team 04/17/2023

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 816x624 or better Display
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 816x624 or better Display

name: 小拾逅 Gathering Our Childhoods

  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 816x624 or better Display

short_description: The story of the game is about the player traveling back to the childhood campus. Players are required to complete all kinds of tasks, so as to collect the memory points to be able to return to the original world. Let's have a childhood journey together!
